title: New: TĀLĀ – The Duchess
body:
This has been blowing up online over the past few days, and quite rightly so.

London based singer/producer [TĀLĀ](https://soundcloud.com/talaofficial) spreads her wings on her debut solo outing, _The Duchess_, a dark, majestic number, best listened to at full volume. Not too far from the heavy, beat-based productions of Clams Casino or Shlohmo, it’s slightly discomforting at times yet a hugely promising first step. Well worth keeping an eye out for.
